nodes.title:
I’m starting to think the bull market could last way longer than most ppl think

Robinhood just raised $3+ billion like it came out of thin air

There’s just so much $$$ sloshing around that if we don’t get a face-ripping melt up every correction will continue to be met w/buyers
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
我开始觉得牛市可能会比大多数人想象的持续时间更长

Robinhood刚融资30多亿美元，就像从天而降一样

有这么多的美元美元四处游荡，如果我们没有得到一个脸撕裂融化了，每一个修正将继续满足/买家

我開始覺得牛市可能會比大多數人想象的持續時間更長

Robinhood剛融資30多億美元，就像從天而降一樣

有這麼多的美元美元四處遊蕩，如果我們沒有得到一個臉撕裂融化了，每一個修正將繼續滿足/買家

nodes.title:
Netflix is already in talks to make a movie about the events over the past week. 

So is Amazon. So is HBO. So is CBS. So is Hulu. So is USA. And AMC networks. And Disney. And Turner. And CSPAN.
nodes.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
Netflix已经在商讨拍摄一部关于过去一周事件的电影。

亚马逊也是。HBO也是。CBS也是 Hulu也是 美国电视台也是 和AMC网络。和迪斯尼。和特纳。和CSPAN。

Netflix已經在商討拍攝一部關於過去一週事件的電影。

亞馬遜也是。HBO也是。CBS也是 Hulu也是 美國電視臺也是 和AMC網絡。和迪斯尼。和特納。和CSPAN。

nodes.excerpt: Bullet is a mobile and web app that helps you manage your tasks & events, and write your journal all in the same place. Inspired by the popular Bullet Journaling methodology.

localize.tagline: 在手机上管理你的任务、事件和日记。

nodes.excerpt: An interactive space that shows how product management best practices work, including working examples of OKRs, outcome-based roadmaps, along with real examples of ideas, experiments, and customer feedback. nodes.excerpt: Simple - Essential analytics in a single page dashboard. No Code - Find how users interact with buttons, videos & forms by selecting them from your page. Custom Events & Funnels. Privacy friendly - No personal data collected. No Cookies. GRDP & CCPA compliant.

nodes.excerpt: Essentially, Squat-O-Meter is a mobile app that promises a whole lot of fun by taking users to the ex-Soviet streets and teaching them how to Slav squat. The app uses pose estimation technology good enough to detect and estimate the user’s positions/movements while squatting.
nodes.title: Squat-O-Meter - Squat like a gopnik in the ex-USSR streets.
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 本质上，Squat-O-Meter是一款手机应用，它承诺将用户带到前苏联的街道上，教他们如何进行斯拉夫人蹲，从而带来很多乐趣。这款应用使用的姿势估计技术足以检测和估计用户下蹲时的位置/动作。
localize.tagline: 像戈普尼克一样蹲在前苏联的街道上。

localize.description: 本質上，Squat-O-Meter是一款手機應用，它承諾將用戶帶到前蘇聯的街道上，教他們如何進行斯拉夫人蹲，從而帶來很多樂趣。這款應用使用的姿勢估計技術足以檢測和估計用戶下蹲時的位置/動作。
localize.tagline: 像戈普尼克一樣蹲在前蘇聯的街道上。
